resources.string: There are no valid update packages.
Server error: Please update server source code.
Your system is currently up to date.
A firmware update will enhance machine stability and patch any bugs.
Do you want to install the system update now?
During installation tablet cannot be used, even for emergency calls. Do not remove the battery or the SD card and do not turn the device off.
During installation the phone cannot be used, even for emergency calls. Do not remove the battery or the SD card and do not turn the phone off.
The latest system updates package was found on the SD card. Do you want to install it?

During installation the tablet cannot be used, even for emergency calls. Do not remove the battery or the SD card or turn the tablet off. \nBefore starting installation ensure the package was downloaded from the official website and has not been corrupted.

Phone cannot be used, even for emergency calls, during installation. Do not remove the battery or the SD card or turn the phone off. \nBefore installation, ensure that the package was downloaded from the official website and has not been corrupted.
Do you want to download the system optimization update?
We recommend using a free Wi-Fi hotspot or an unlimited data plan to apply this update, otherwise standard data connection charges may apply. \nPlease back up your data before upgrading.
Downloading through a mobile network may invoke additional charges. Do you want to continue?
Tap to install the system update
SD card error. Please check the card and try again.
SD card mount error, please check.
Installation requires at least %s bytes of space. Release some storage to continue.
Ensure the package was downloaded from the official website and is not corrupted. Otherwise system problems may result.
Unknown error! Please leave this page and try again.
Not enough space on the SD card.
System update stopped. Upgrade is invalid!
This operation will discard the downloaded file.
Current APN does not support downloading. Do you want to change to another APN or turn on Wi-Fi?
Package error. Please check update and download again.
No enough space on the device.
No enough space on the phone.
Need full package to change partition.
Congratulations! Update of phone to version %s successful.
To continue the upgrade copy the package to phone storage.\nNot enough space on the phone.
SD card is not mounted. System upgrade stopped!
Do you want to scan the SD card for more update packages?

System supports firmware upgrade from official website or server only. Using 3rd party ROM images and/or any other root methods to upgrade firmware will cause instability. Please note user is responsible for any problems which might result.
